name: Amanda Foster
coverLetter: Technical writer with 4 years of experience creating clear, user-friendly documentation for complex technical products. I specialize in API documentation, user guides, and developer resources. My goal is to bridge the gap between technical complexity and user understanding through well-structured, accessible content.

profile: Technical writer with expertise in creating documentation for software products and APIs.
Experienced in collaborating with engineering teams to understand complex technical concepts.
Strong focus on user-centered writing and information architecture.
managementBackground: Led documentation initiatives for product launches affecting 50K+ developers.
Established style guides and writing standards adopted across multiple teams.
technicalBackground: Proficient in documentation tools and markup languages including Markdown and HTML.
Experience with API testing tools and understanding of software development lifecycle.

education.title: Master of Arts in Technical Communication
Bachelor of Arts in English Literature

responsibilities: Created comprehensive API documentation reducing developer onboarding time by 60%.
Collaborated with product managers and engineers to document new features and updates.
Established documentation review process ensuring consistency and accuracy.
Wrote user guides and help articles for SaaS platform with 10K+ users.
Created video tutorials and interactive guides for complex workflows.
Maintained knowledge base and FAQ sections based on user feedback.
Assisted in creating technical documentation for various client projects.
Conducted user research to understand documentation needs and pain points.
Edited and proofread technical content for clarity and accuracy.
